quotes.quote: Self-care is never a selfish act—it is simply good stewardship of the only gift I have, the gift I was put on earth to offer to others.
quotes.author: Parker Palmer

quotes.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Rise up, start fresh, and see the bright opportunity in each new day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched—they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Every morning is a new beginning, a new chance to rewrite your story.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: “In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.”
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: “To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: "I believe we are here on the planet Earth to live, grow up and do what we can to make this world a better place for all people to enjoy freedom."
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
